name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a robust skill set focused on **backend development**, **system design**, and **database management** tailored for high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. I specialize in creating **real-time** and **batch-processing** systems leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. 
My full-stack capabilities include proficiency in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by extensive knowledge in cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade applications that incorporate AI/ML features for enhanced analytics and automation.
I am well-versed in **data modeling** and have a solid foundation in **microservices architecture** and **CI/CD automation**, ensuring that the solutions I deliver meet compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I bring significant hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
